author: Michael Matson
comment: I've used this app for a long time now, and I absolutely love it. So much less annoying than Roku's official app. My only complaint is that the dev removed the landscape mode. Since I have a long phone that only sits sideways, I miss that feature.

author: Fernandes Alex F
comment: I bought this one thinking it was the Roku Wear Remote. That one cost less and has the complete remote control on the wear.  This stupid app only has play and pause.

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: You're blaming me because you thought you downloaded a different app? lol

title: I got screwed

author: daniel reyes
comment: Thanks for this app! My kids are constantly losing the remote. This app completely solved that problem. Bonus it works for multiple roku sticks without any programming involved. Just install and use. Easy.
title: Works perfectly

author: Adrian Rightsell
comment: This is the best Roku remote I have found thus far. It does still need a little tweeking though. It does not recognize my Roku Stick nor my TCL Roku TV (but they do connect manually) and the one thing lacking from ALL of the Roku apps except the official; does not control the volume or wake a Roku TV from Eco Mode. So I find myself switching back and forth between the two (this has better layout than the official app). Hopefully these can be addressed in the future.

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Hi Adrian, volume control is coming very soon to this version. We just released volume control on our free version. As far as the on/off control, this is technically impossible to add because of the limitations with the roku developer API

title: Works Good

author: Stephen Woodthorpe
comment: Outstanding app. Spent first 5 minutes trying to figure out how to configure it to multiple Roku devices, before realizing it auto configured itself and was ready for use. Exceptionally easy, user friendly. Top job.

author: Katie Harvey RN
comment: Great alternative for remote.
title: Love it!

author: Toye Omolade
comment: Brilliant

author: Bento Pereira
comment: Downgraded to Android KitKat and this app work great now. I use the Device button quite a lot because I have two Roku devices. So please keep it accessible. Thanks. Far better than the Roku original app.

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Hi Bento, So the update you're talking about came out over a year ago. I wanted the app to be more native for Android so I got rid of the iOS style tab. Also, the devices page isnt something most users look at on a regular basis so I wanted to free up space on the remote screen. Thanks for your feedback! I will keep this in mind going forward.

title: Great

author: Jeff Ross
comment: Only one thing could make it better. Any chance of implementing the ability to surf the channel store??

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Hey Jeff, unfortunately Roku doesn't allow developers like us to add that functionality.

title: Awesome!

author: Cheri Meyer
comment: Synced immediately; works better than the actual remote!
title: Day 2

author: Glenn Phillips
comment: It works
title: Roku

author: Wes Titus
comment: Nearly perfect! Beautiful design, faster than regular Roku app.  All it needs is vibration feedback and it'd be 5 stars.

author: David Hansen
comment: Simple and robust.
title: Reliable

author: Jesus Fernandez
comment: Works quickly and perfectly for the times I can't find my roku remote. Being able to use my phones keyboard for searches is a huge plus too

author: Jay Yeasmin
comment: Graphics could be sharper for my 577 ppi display though, don't know if the same can be done for the channels graphics. Also would like to be able to stream to roku
title: Great

author: sharon daniel
comment: Greatest ever
title: Great !!!! I akways have my phone, but I always lose the remote control

author: Trevor Hackathorn
comment: Much better than other roku apps. I love that I can switch channels and change devices so easily
title: So

author: Adam Bernas
comment: Pretty straightforward. Does the job & it works. Searching is much easier using the phones keyboard.

author: Matt McLaughlin
comment: New design is awesome and works great!
title: Newest Update

author: William Thresher
comment: This app is fantastic but it really needs a dpad on android wear to be complete.
title: Almost perfect

author: Marcos Monetti
comment: It works all the time everytime
title: It works

author: doug isnice
comment: This app works great. Dependable and works simple as that.
title: Robyte

author: Toya Eskimo
comment: The trial worked on my phone and I really liked the features. However, when I purchased it, it wasn't working. Then I discovered that I had to manually input my Roku's ip address as the full version didn't automatically scan the entire network, only the wireless and my Roku is connected via Ethernet cord

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Hi Toya, thanks for the comments. However the code in the trial and the pro version are exactly the same. So the issue you ran into was just a network fluke.

title: Works, but had to manually set up Roku

author: Mig Phillip Law
comment: Loved the trial, bought the app. I still love it and it's great. And you should get it. Especially if you have a tablet... I tried others (including the app from Roku itself) and this one was far superior. However, it needs better support-- a help tab under the menu that tells how to pair and lists a website or email address. And FAQs/support email on the website.  Also: minor potential bug in the paid version. Another reviewer, Toya, reported having to manually input the IP address. The TinyByte reply was that it was a network fluke. Well... I had the exact same thing happen, and the exact same setup. The trial worked right out of the box... I hit "scan", it found my Roku, and it worked right  away. But the paid one, I tapped "scan", and nothing happened. Restarted the app, same thing. Eventually, I manually entered the IP address and then it worked fine. But not everyone will think to do that, or know where to look. (Here's where you need in-app FAQs.)  Like Toya, I have my Roku connected via ethernet... so maybe that's part of the issue? I don't have it connected to my home wireless. Anyway-- guys, this is starting to look like a bug and not a network glitch.

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content:
Hi Mig
Thanks for the feedback & glad you like the app. As far as support, our email is listed in the app description. We've always tried to make it very clear that we are reachable for any issue so that we can help our users on a one to one level. I cannot post my technical response due to lack of characters so please email me so we can discuss.

title: GREAT app but...

author: Aileen Morales
comment: I had bought this app when I bought my Roku. I was trying to re-install it onto my new phone and downloaded a different app that was free by accident. The other app was horrible, I wasn't sure why it wasn't working lol. I appreciate this app now lol. Since the other one was bad.
title: Happy

author: Kevin Landers Sample
comment: This thing blows the official Roku remote app away. It's also tons better than the real remote. It's quick to respond and you can use your voice to search for things. It's totally worth the $2.99
title: Sweeeet!

author: Charles Loughlin
comment: I have just finished d-loading 4 different Roku remotes, all claiming how simple they were. Uninstalled them all...and I had the same issue with manually having to enter the IP.   And then this app came boldly onto my tablet, and without having to do anything with IP searches or anything (except press one check mark)...SHAZAM! I'm watchin' and controlin' and everything is Kool and the Gang !   Only thing else I could ask for is that Fruity Pebbles could grow on trees !! Maybe next update, huh...
title: OUTSTANDING !!!

author: Rich Garris
comment: This is hands down, the best Roku remote I've ever used. Well worth the money. I will be sharing this with my friends.
title: This kicks butt.

comment: Easy to set it up and a clean interface which make this a no brainer , stop looking and buy this
title: Control of your Roku is always at hand with this installed.

author: Multicultural Radio
comment: I'm not going to manually enter the RoKu  Ip because it is dynamic and will change.   Uninstalling -  doesn't work.

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Hey Terry, can you shoot me an email so I can help figure out what's happening with the app not finding your IP address? tinybyteapps@gmail.com Thanks - Victor

title: Doesn't control my ROKU

author: Ryan Goldstein
comment: Android wear for moto 360 not working. Yet it claims support and shows moto 360 on appstore. Seems like a scam app

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Hi Ryan, no not a scam. To use the Android wear app your phone needs to be on Android Lollipop as per the description in the play store. If you are in fact on Lollipop please email me right away so I can figure out how to fix any issue that might be preventing the app from working. Thanks! -Victor (tinybyteapps@gmail.com)

title: Android wear for moto 360 not working.

author: M C
comment: Could have more features at the very least keep up with what the standard Roku but works great and my wife uses it more than the real remote.
title: Good

author: Scott Shelbourn
comment: This app works great with my roku. I have had it for 6 months and never had a problem. Worth the price for sure.
title: Great App!

author: Marc Riel
comment: Much better than first party app. Superb tablet support, and engaging design.
title: Impressive App

author: Christopher Navarro
comment: RoByte remote for Roku is a great app.  I love it!!

author: Tim Beckim
comment: Hmmmm?

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: I'm not sure why you had to buy the app multiple times. You might want to contact Google because I have no control over payments for Google Play. You absolutely should not have to pay multiple times for any app

title: Hmmmm?

comment: So I lost my Roku remote. Seriously, no idea where I put it. (I figure as soon as I have a workable solution, I'll find it. Murphy's Law and all that.)  I priced out replacing the remote and the cheapest I can find is $20 or 30.... and there's always the possibility that I'll lose that one, too. You know what I never lose, though? My tablet.  The Official Roku app requires that your Roku be on the same wireless network as your phone/tablet, but my Roku is wired because I wanted the faster connection. In that case, the Official Roku app simply doesn't work for you... Added to that, in order to set up the wireless, I'd need the remote (or a working substitute), which I don't have.   This app had good reviews, so I did the two-day free trial. I'm not even through the end of that yet, but I already know I'm willing to pay for the full version. It discovered my Roku with no setup. It works even though my Roku is wired. It has all the functionality of my original remote and I'm exponentially less likely to lose it.   Totally awesome. Thank you!!
title: $20 to replace the remote or $3 to use my tablet? Hrmmm....

author: A Google User
comment: This thing is awesome. It's pleasant to look at, the functionality is excellent especially for tablet. It's worth the money, easily. I would pay it again if I had to. It's a really, really, good remote. The widgets are a great addition as well! When I requested something to the developer he was very quick to respond. Getting a response at all is great, he was tip top in helping me.
title: Design & Function is all there!

author: Michael Kuffel
comment: This is a very usable app and a good alternative to the official roku app.  Very simple to set up and intuitive to use. Love that it can control multiple devices.  My favorite function is the keyboard/search; works very well.  I also like the swipe option for the remote. I would like to see added support for "Play on Roku" (a new function of the official app) to stream mp3s and photos from phone through roku device.  Very cool feature that I would like to see added to this app.  Keep it up!
title: Very usable, needs support for "Play on Roku"

author: lisa lamneck
comment: Worked one time then stopped what junk give me my money back now!!!! Scammers!

reply.author: TinyByte Apps
reply.content: Lisa, we've tried contacting you to give you a refund but you never responded. Again, please email us at tinybyteapps@gmail.com

title: Horrible
